title: Antarctic Vigil
creator_credit: Film Australia and Dept of Interior for the Australian Film Board in association with The Australian National Anatarctic Research Expedition
brief_description: An account of research undertaken by Australian scientists at the Antarctic outposts of Macquarie, Kerguelen and Heard Islands. Shows life on these islands including work at the meteorological stations and studies of the unusual animal, bird and plant life found in Arctic regions.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia and Dept of Interior for the Australian Film Board in association with The Australian National Anatarctic Research Expedition
